ModMetaData.name: PowerGen Ex
ModMetaData.author: Haplo, Mrofa
ModMetaData.description:
This is an example mod with two power generation buildings -Dark Energy Generator The generator provides energy for two days, but needs some power to recharge afterwards. He can be used as an emergency generator. -Wind Turbine The wind turbine uses the wind to generate power. It needs a clear wind path before and behind the blades. Thanks to Architect for some of the ideas
For the SourceCode, look at the example dll project: http://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=3408.0
